story.title: Story
text: Year 2700, in an era when humanity freely travels between stars.

Princess Yori of planet Celestial is exiled to the distant
uninhabited planet Arcadia without understanding why.
Desperate to know the reason, she discovers the truth as she industrializes the planet.
The people she thought abandoned her had actually loved her all alongâ€”

1.name: Yori
1.description: The second princess of planet Celestial. Exiled to planet Arcadia without knowing why. Initially a helpless noble lady, she advances industrialization with the help of her support AI and best friend.

2.name: Eleno
2.description: A general-purpose support AI system that accompanied Yori to planet Arcadia as her caretaker.

3.name: Kurua
3.description: Athletic, deeply cheerful and generous. Friendly and talkative. Loves money and will do anything to survive.
